about_the_game:
This original soundtrack contains the 11 beautifully crafted songs of Light Fall. Lose yourself in these immersive melodies that have captured the essence of the world of Numbra. The soundtrack was created in collaboration with Peak Media and Jupiterion.

01. Came From The Light
02. Altars
03. Lunar
04. Lagoon
05. Marshlands
06. March
07. Broken
08. Distant Light
09. Distant Horizons
10. Evil Sight
11. Dune (Bonus Track)
